    Author:
    Konstantin Nosach (kostyantyn.nosach@telestax.com)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindFailed(long sessionID, com.cloudhopper.smpp.pdu.Pdu packet)
      Send unbind response with error code to client and remove client and server implementation from map if server discard bind request because of error

      Signals that server connection is ok

      • connectionLost

        void connectionLost(Long sessionId,
                  com.cloudhopper.smpp.pdu.Pdu packet,
                  int serverIndex)
        Change state of server implementation(REBINDING) and try to reconnect to another server when connection lost to server
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session (client) id
        packet - bind packet received from client
        serverIndex - index of server to which client was connected
